## 2019 Batting Stats
```{r pressure, echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
batters <- read_csv("~/Google Drive/KBO/batters_simple.csv")
batters <- batters[complete.cases(batters),]
batters$Age <- as.numeric(batters$Age)
d <- batters %>% subset(Team == "LG Twins") %>% subset(Season == "2019") %>% select(-Team, -Season, -ID)
d <- d[order(-d$WAR),]
d$Name <- paste0("[", d$Name, "](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/", d$Name, ")")
kable(d, digits = c(0,0,0,0,0,3,1,1,3,3,1,2), col.names = c("Name","Age","G","PA","HR","OPS","BB%","SO%","ISO","BABIP","wRC+","WAR")) %>% kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"), fixed_thead = T) %>%column_spec(1, bold = T, border_right = T)
```
## 2019 Pitching Stats
```{r, echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
pitchers <- read_csv("~/Google Drive/KBO/pitchers_simple.csv")
pitchers <- pitchers[complete.cases(pitchers),]
d <- pitchers %>% subset(Team == "LG Twins") %>% subset(Season == "2019") %>% select(-Team, -Season, -ID)
d <- d[order(-d$WAR),]
d$Name <- paste0("[", d$Name, "](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/", d$Name, ")")
kable(d, digits = c(0,0,0,0,0,1,1,1,3,2,2,2), col.names = c("Name","Age","G","GS","IP","K/9","BB/9","HR/9","BABIP","ERA","FIP","WAR")) %>% kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"), fixed_thead = T) %>% column_spec(1, bold = T, border_right = T)
```
